name: Glassmorphic Card
description:
Glassmorphic Card is a demo from Glassmorphism

Linear Fill was applied with various objects.

Background Blur is a most important to achieve Glass-Like.

Stroke with Linear Fill was applied as well for almost objects that can reflect light.

Addition, Noise can help too to make a realistic feel and look as it's giving rough nor smooth on the Card more with Frosted Look.


Ctto, This is a inspired work
